question: [Focus] Turkce: (132, 204), (136, 132), (181, 149) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.

qas.question: [Focus] Turkce: (132, 204), (136, 132), (181, 149) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla.
[Practice] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (132, 204), (136, 132), (181, 149). Provide only the area.
[Review] Nederlands: Bepaal oppervlakte en omtrek van de driehoek met punten (132, 204), (136, 132), (181, 149). Provide only the perimeter.
